release_note: Bug Fixes Fixed alignment issues that could cause some annotations to be misplaced or not appear. Fixed a bug where changes outside the app might not appear when reopening a file. Fixed problems when removing a file from the app while the file is open. Fixed pasting pages. Fixed a problem that could cause a cloud tool to create non cloud rectangles.

This version offers a completely overhauled document save system to improve data reliability and prevent loss in the event of save failures and even app crashes. New autosave process in which changes are saved to a backup location within seconds. New Save to... dialogs if saving to the original file fails now you can save your changes to a new location. Recovery dialogs when re opening after a crash or save failure to restore unsaved changes. Completely rewritten how we operate with third party storage like iCloud OneDrive and Google Drive including adding Revert and Reload options so you can pick up changes that may have occurred on another device. Plus many other technical improvements including: Faster updates on the canvas particularly for pages with many annotations Faster document loading including incremental loading for pages with thousands of annotations Read only documents can now be opened in place instead of requiring a copy to a readable location Fixed crashes that could occur when deleting annotations Fixed crashes that could occur when uploading renaming or moving files Fixed deadlocks that could occur when other applications on the system attempted to read from a file that was open in Drawboard PDF
Improved performance when many pen annotations are selected

Features Canvas context menu quickly perform page actions or insert new annotations Bug Fixes Fixed issues when dragging annotations between pages Fixed issues when using drag and drop to add images onto the canvas Fixed issues affecting pasted annotations on rotated pages Fixed visual issues affecting note and audio note annotations on rotated pages Fixed a bug where a pasting a page could occur on a document where pages changes should be disabled

Features New export flow including options to flatten all annotations and compress the document Added support for rotating pages in the left side panel Bug Fixes Fixed a crash that could occur from re ordering pages in the left side panel Fixed an issue where iCloud files could not be opened in place Fixed an issue where annotations could appear on incorrect pages after a page re order Fixed an issue where text on rotated pages could not be resized correctly
Bug Fixes: Fixed a bug where opening files could fail with the message This file is not supported for builtin conversion.

Features Font alignment and formatting options now available when creating Text and Callout annotations Improvements Text annotations automatically resize to fit their contents and can scale to easily increase decrease font size Text annotations can be created with a single tap in addition to dragging out their bounds Improved messaging when a read only file must be copied to a writeable location before opening Bug Fixes Fixed an issue where editing rotated text would change the rotation and bounds during editing Fixed display of tool properties at the narrowest screen widths

Features New design for the tool editor including a preview to display your adjustments and collapsible sections Bug Fixes Fixes an issue that prevents changes made to cloud documents while offline from syncing when a network becomes available Fixes an issue that may cause in progress changes to a cloud document to be cancelled
Improvements: Image annotations can be created on the page with a single tap in addition to dragging out their bounds

Features Bottom bar redesign keep navigation and viewing controls tidy at the bottom of the screen Ink to shape create squares ellipses polygons with a press and hold at the end of pen lines Line patterns add identifying patterns to lines and arrows to clarify complex plans and diagrams Bug Fixes Fix a problem where zooming into text boxes could create blurry or mis sized elements when editing Fixed callout text exporting incorrectly rotated on rotated pages Improvements Combine the separate Trash Remove and Delete actions into a single Delete action that can take appropriate action based on how your files are stored after warning you about what will happen Cursor keys now work to scroll the Canvas

Features Added support for creating hyperlinks on cloud documents Added support for creating links to a specific area on a page Added support for dragging and dropping pages between documents Bug Fixes Fixed an issue where selecting and moving multiple annotations at a time could take minutes to process

Features Added Ruler for drawing straight lines and angles with pen tools and measuring calibrated distances Added cloud line style for polygons Bug Fixes Fixed a crash that could occur when the selection had zero width
Features Added Email Upload feature for Pro users accessed from the user profile menu at the top left of the dashboard

Features Added new Calligraphy pen for beautiful lettering with a hand written feel You can now set your profile image from the Account Details screen Bug Fixes Opening tool properties while the page navigator is visible won t cause tool properties to fail on iPhone Fixed a flicker that could occur when dragging annotations around on the canvas.
Fixes Fixed the dismissal of the New Document sheet after creation Fixed the What s New badge count

Features Learn more about advanced annotation and PDF file capabilities in Explore Pro accessed from the learning menu at the top right of the canvas Fixes Fixes an issue when editing text annotations where the the left right arrows would nudge the annotation instead of moving the cursor

Features New sort and filter options on your files list to better organize your PDFs Add tags to your PDFs in Drawboard Cloud to organize your PDFs across your devices. Improvements Annotation snapping is now on by default

Audio notes: record attach sound files to your documents Cut copy page pages: edit document pages from the canvas pages panel New document from clipboard: easily create new documents from copied pages Snapping: perfectly align vertices centers and edges between shapes toggle from bottom right canvas options Z order: bring to front send to back Convert text markup: switch between selection underline highlight and more from the selection toolbar

Features Text selections and markups are now resizable Bug Fixes Fixed text appearing at the wrong angle on rotated pages Fixed some issues with bookmark title editing Fixed some situations where the app could crash or misbehave in scenarios involving popovers and split screen Fixed Canvas navigation bar display issues on iPad mini
Bug Fixes Addressed an issue that could cause reopening local files to fail Improvements Improved button layout and readability in some popover

Features: Added a new Lite subscription tier for cheaper access to our most popular tools and features Export files with compression to reduce file sizes Import from Microsoft 365 documents to PDF Improvements: Fixed some issues causing slow performance on the Canvas for some users Files from third party drives e.g. OneDrive or Google Drive are now imported instead of opened in place fixing unexpected loss of changes and version conflicts Bug fixes: Fixed mirroring to Apple TV Fixed validation issues when editing bookmarks Receiving a link to a cloud file should work even if you re viewing another file

Features Keyboard shortcuts are now available on the Canvas including cut copy paste undo redo delete and 1 9 to select tools Password protected PDFs can now be opened Custom line endings for line and arrow annotations

Features Keyboard shortcuts are now available on the Canvas including cut copy paste undo redo delete and 1 9 to select tools Password protected PDFs can now be opened Custom line endings for line and arrow annotations

Bug fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur when reconnecting to the network Fixed a crash that could occur when creating ink annotations Fixed an issue where annotations made from other clients while you re offline might not appear without closing and reopening Fixed an issue where Saving a local copy of a cloud document might not download all annotations

Features Selection boxes and highlights have an improved design with better usability on touch devices Search sort and filter options are available in the Annotations List available from the left drawer on the Canvas

Features: Invite links to Drawboard Cloud documents will now open and accept directly in the app instead of needing to accept via web Improvements: The fullscreen toggle will now hide more controls for a clean reading or distraction free annotating experience controls can be revealed again with a tap Exporting a Drawboard Cloud file will ensure all images and measurement scales for all pages in the document are downloaded before exporting

Features: Annotations List: quickly see all your annotations from a list in the left drawer on the Canvas Support for form text fields radio buttons and checkboxes Improvements: Ongoing work to improve the performance of ink annotations Bugs: Fixed an issue that could prevent annotations synchronizing with the cloud. To fully resolve this problem some cloud files will automatically download again the next time they are opened.

Bug Fixes Fixed a problem where cloud annotations would fail to download after downloading a document. Fixed a problem when multiple documents were open in split screen only the latest would save reliably.

Features Image annotations can now be created via drag and drop from other applications Bug Fixes The z order of annotations should be preserved correctly when saving to files Exporting cloud documents will download all cloud annotations before export Annotations deleted in cloud documents should not reappear when viewed in Safari or Preview Improvements Very long lines drawn using ink tools should update faster Screens explaining Drawboard subscriptions have been updated to show more of the benefits
Bug fix: Fixed a problem where a copy of an annotation could be left behind after moving.

Features Night mode and Invert mode can now be used to customize document appearance on the Canvas Annotating with Apple Pencil or fingers can now be toggled from the Canvas Bug Fixes Addressed some minor iOS 16 display issues Corrected some situations where images in cloud files could fail to load

Features Current page and position will be remembered for each document and restored on reopening Partial erase for ink annotations What s New and Support options available from the navigation bar on the Canvas Bug fixes Fixed issue where cloud documents were incorrectly limited to 100 files Improvements File related actions available on the Canvas from the improved Title menu Smoother scrolling and faster loading for pages with lots of annotations Annotations can be dragged between pages
Bug Fix: Better display and handling of subscription plan types.

Features Added Note annotation tool Added Hyperlinks annotation tool and handling of links within the current document Bug Fixes Tool properties popup should display correctly when you have large numbers of tools in your toolbar Fixed a bug that could cause some uploads to fail Improvements Selecting an annotation when multiple annotations are very close together should be more precise Dashed and dotted linestyles are available on more annotation types Creating a document or annotation from an image can now use images from the camera or a file in addition to images from your photo library.

Features New document backgrounds including background colors lined paper graph paper music staves grids and dot patterns Signature tool for saving personal signatures and simplifying repeated data like name and date Bug Fixes Add new page button should now work correctly on iPhones Improvements Undo redo should be more reliable on cloud documents

Features Measurement annotations including line length polyline length rectangular area and polygon area Callout annotations Dashed and dotted linestyles Laser pointer tool Enhanced Color Picker for detailed color selection Pen setting to enable or disable pressure sensitivity Bug Fixes Fixed text box display on rotated pages Fixed some uncommon crashes on opening a document Improvements Improved rendering of annotations when viewed in other apps
Bug Fixes Fixed a crash affecting some users when searching. Improvements Better layout and controls for search and bookmarks in landscape on iPhones.

Added search and navigation capabilities to the left drawer on the canvas including: Full text document search Bookmarks also known as Outline Resizable thumbnail navigator on iPad A new Copy to Drawboard action can now be enabled in system Share sheets to ensure files are copied to the Drawboard folder or Cloud when opening.
Fixed a problem preventing use of the Select color and Replace tool panels Fixed a crash when some annotation properties cannot not be read
Features Support for upcoming Drawboard Cloud changes Bug Fixes Fixed a bug where minimum zoom might not allow viewing large page sizes Fixed a bug where cloud annotations were exported as rectangles
Bug Fixes Fixes a bug where tools could be lost on logout Fixes document opening issues on macOS Improvements Updates to files on shared drives should be detected without needing to restart the app

Improvements Increased reliability during open from and save to operations on third party drives including OneDrive Enhanced autosave functionality for faster and more frequent saves Added Reveal in Files action in context menu for local files Improved handling of pen annotations on imported documents Bug fixes Various bug fixes including exported text box annotations and rectangles and polygons with transparent fills. Resolved various annotation and inking issues Other minor bug fixes and enhancements

Features Users can now delete their account from settings Various bug fixes Bug Fixes Fixed an issue where the user couldn t view their available cloud storage capacity Fixed an issue where the user could not upload documents shortly after deleting a document Fixed an issue where text in a text box would be removed upon font size change Fixed an issue where text box reverts to original state upon edit on a cloud document Fixed page layout issues on iPhone Fixed menu layout issues on iPad Mini Fixed an issue where annotations would flicker Redo not working for some text annotations in some cases Measurement calibrations are now updated instantly when changed in Windows or Web. Improvements Open in Drawboard PDF action from other apps now take the user directly to the new document s canvas. Improved the order in which edits are applied to annotations when syncing with the cloud. Polyline annotations that are made on Windows and Web will now show side lengths on iOS The new document name field now has a default name Improved reliability and accuracy of uploads

Features Added support for double tap controls on Apple Pencil 2nd Gen Bug Fixes Fixed a crash bug when loading documents with large numbers of annotations. Fixed an issue affecting saving image annotations to local files. Fixes for pen annotations made in other apps.
